## Track 1: Overall Musicality Score Prediction

Two types of test sets are provided for Track 1:

**Set 1**: Contains songs generated by the same generative models used in the training set.

**Set 2 (Challenge Set)**: Includes songs generated by 10 different open-source generative models, offering a more diverse and challenging evaluation scenario. This set aims to assess each modelâ€™s generalization ability to unseen generation systems.

**Download link**:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1nAx25FC1xDhi5CDabrCivjVoeO3IgT2d?usp=sharing
